s: In a small Texas kitchen and with 50 cents worth of sugar, Dee & Sarah McCraw created their famous and timeless taffy. Since 1908, McCraws taffy recipe has remained unchanged and is just as popular today as it was 100 years ago! Hammond's is now pleased to be manufacturing this delicious candy!

November 26, 2024 - Amazon offers multiple lines of privately labeled products. These are available on Amazon.com, Amazon Fresh, Prime Pantry, Prime Now, Amazon Go, and Whole Foods Market. Amazon houses its in-house brand offerings under the “Our Brands” label, which is separate from exclusive brands.
